Question
========

In a two-way ANOVA with factors A and B, there is an interaction as

Answerlist
----------

* The mean square for the interaction is approximately equal to the mean square of the error
* Both factor A and B have a significant main effect
* The difference between two levels of factor B depends on the level of factor A

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* The mean square for the interaction is approximately equal to the mean square of the error: Incorrect
* Both factor A and B have a significant main effect: Incorrect
* The difference between two levels of factor B depends on the level of factor A: Correct
